statements: DELETE FROM student_language_proficiency WHERE country_code = 'USA' AND language = 'English';
DELETE FROM language_proficiency_levels WHERE student_id = 100 AND language_code = 'ENG';
DELETE FROM country_data WHERE continent = 'Europe' AND country_code = 'UK';
DELETE FROM student_info WHERE age > 30 AND nationality = 'USA';
DELETE FROM program_customization WHERE learning_program = 'English' AND program_status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM student_languages WHERE language_id = (SELECT id FROM language WHERE language_name = 'Spanish');
